ai-patthana22.24:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.24:1.1_0: No cause is the reason for the sake of listening to the teaching.
ai-patthana22.24:1.1_1: No causes and reason for the sake of listening to the teaching.
ai-patthana22.24:1.1_2: Nor are they cause or reason for the sake of criticism that the cause and reason for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana22.24:3.1_0: Nor do you take pleasure in the past. for the sake of the past the future is a condition for the cause.
ai-patthana22.24:4.1_0: For seven qualifications for supernormal powers ...
